content: Thank you trying Skincremental! Your feedback is crucial for us to improve and tailor our products more closely to your needs. Please take a few moments to share your thoughts with us.

questions.question: Roughly how many times have you used the product since you recieved it?
On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the products you received?
How easily were you able to tell the difference between the two variations?
Which product variation did you prefer, A or B?
Why did you prefer that variation?
What do you think about your product's consistency/texture?
Have you noticed any signs of the product splitting or going bad?
Please share any thoughts about the product consistency
On a scale of 1-5, how effectively did our AI understand and address your skin concerns?
Do you have any specific feedback or suggestions for our AI's functionality?  What would you like to see improved?
We're always looking to improve our website's usability. Do you have any suggestions for making our web interface more user-friendly?
If we were to charge for our personalized skincare service, what price would you expect to pay for the experience and products you recieved?
Would you be interested in placing another order?
options: Yes, I'd like to evolve this recipe
Yes, but I'd like to try a different recipe
No, I'm not interested in ordering again

content: We are still working some kinks out of the AI integration for order variation.  We'll be in touch with you soon to build your next recipe.

questions.question: How much do you want your variation to differ from your current preferred recipe?
What are your goals for the next variations?  What qualities of your formula would you like to improve upon?
Is there anything else you'd like to share about your experience with us?

content: Thank you for your feedback.  If you've selected that you're interested in placing another order, we'll be in touch with you soon to build your next recipe, or you can build a new recipe from scratch using the homepage at your convenience.
